## `gdocker dev`

Provides utilities to setting up and managing directories and templates for Docker image building.

To see help and available options for this command:

```{bash}
gdocker help dev
```

### `gdocker dev init`

```{bash}
gdocker dev init -h
```

### `gdocker dev mkdir`

```{bash}
gdocker dev mkdir -h
```

### `gdocker dev config`

```{bash}
gdocker dev config -h
```

### `gdocker dev save`

```{bash}
gdocker dev save -h
```

### `gdocker dev cp`

```{bash}
gdocker dev cp -h
```
